title: Open New Checking Account
description: A new customer wants to open a basic checking account online.

tasks.description: Gather customer's personal information and verify their identity using a provided document.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully collects and verifies customer PII against the document.

tasks.description: Present available checking account options and their features.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the 'Basic Checking' and 'Interest Checking' accounts.

tasks.description: Create the new checking account and provide the customer with their new account number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the account and provides the correct account details.
